MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the PA2 postcode area of Paisley is still ongoing. This is due to onsite difficulties and we now expect power to be back on by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:03pm on  Monday, 16 November 2020
